segments.text: Good morning , sir , can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I was wondering if you had the time to show me around this exhibition ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd be glad to , sir . But may I ask what line of business you are in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . Would you be interested in seeing the audio-visual products ? They are made by our company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks , they are rather attractive . But I think there is nothing better than seeing things In actual operation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course . Would you like to make an inspection tour of some factories ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , very much , if it wouldn't add inconvenience to you . First hand information is always more valuable than reading pamphlets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll make the arrangement and let you know the time tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1
